content.p: The Faculty of Social Sciences is comprised of seven major schools. Our schools offer a wide range of undergraduate and postgraduate courses, as well as PhD and research opportunities. An international leader in finance and management education and a pioneer in entrepreneurship, innovation and sustainability. Our courses combine all the core analytical and quantitative techniques required by modern economics graduates. The School of Education has a long history of both teacher education and adult education that stretches back over 100 years. The School of Geography offers an unparalleled environment for the study of a vast and diverse array of geographical topics. We value excellence in teaching coupled with a strong research base and have a broad range of teaching and research activities. We cover many diverse subject areas in contemporary politics. Our courses offer you the opportunity to explore how societies work - and what can be done when they don't. lz-foss-core-ops@exmail.nottingham.ac.uk Current student enquiries
